cover_letter_points.point_text: I thrive in environments where I can take ownership and proactively identify problems, a mindset I applied when I initiated a project at Vivriti Capital that automated a three-month workflow down to four minutes simply because I saw a critical business need.
I am a rapid learner who is comfortable diving into unfamiliar domains, a skill I honed when I was tasked with mastering and then lecturing on a complex neuroscience topic to over 200 students.

I am authorized for full-time employment in the U.S. without requiring any sponsorship now or in the foreseeable future. My availability begins with full-time CPT in January 2026, transitioning seamlessly into my 3-year F-1 OPT/STEM work authorization in June 2026, which extends through June 2029.
